definitions.explanation_en: A surname of Scottish or Irish origin, commonly found in English-speaking countries; often used as a family name without specific semantic meaning beyond identification.
definitions.explanation_cn: 苏格兰或爱尔兰起源的姓氏，常见于英语国家，通常仅作为家族名称使用，除标识身份外无特定语义。
definitions.example_en: Dr. McGee is the lead researcher on the project.
definitions.example_cn: 麦吉博士是该项目的主要研究员。
